programme.title: Geroy
Rodin - Spy, Agent, Hero
programme.desc: Directed by Karen Oganesyan. With Yan Alabushev, Tobias Aspelin, Artem Grigoryev, Svetlana Khodchenkova. 15 years ago, Andrei, under the guidance of his father, Colonel Rodina, was trained in a secret special school, where agents of the Foreign Intelligence Service were trained from teenagers. When the pilot project was closed, Andrei "burned the bridges", remained in Europe and tried not to recall the past. But one day his father calls, whom everyone considered dead. He reports that hunting is open...

programme.title: Le repos des braves
programme.desc: Sur la Grande route des Alpes, Guillaume Brac suit un groupe de valeureux cyclistes, en lutte contre le froid et la fatigue. À travers leurs confessions, c'est tout notre rapport au monde du travail qui transparaît.
